channel.title: Need Assistance Please
channel.description: If theres anyone kind out there to post a link to a couple tuts i need or if they know how to do it please post.Heres what i need. 1.How to make shop sizes bigger for PIMPSCAPE.When i try to add items to existing shops it dont compile. 2.Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9 0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) how can i fix this error? 3.Lastly,How to make it so players cant mass click attack on each other for PIMPSCAPE.

item.title: Need Assistance Please
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

0”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39)
at server.main(server.java:28)
zomg some1 help with this error.what does it mean?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 04:17:41 PM[/size][hr]any1?
